name: Mighty Alex
description:
The best version of world-known endless runner with augmented reality!

RUSH as fast as you can!
EVADE obstacles and collect bonuses!

Help Alex to achieve his goal - open new worlds.
Fascinating, dynamic platformer developed on unique gaming technology with augmented reality Varg Technologies (http://vargtechnologies.com ).

Apokin Aleksei, 12 old boy, who fights for his life and believes that all the best awaits for him ahead, is ideological inspirer of this game!
All collected funds will be used to support Aleksei and children who are sick with oncology and cancer.

Download freely right now!

The game was developed by iLogos and Varg Technologies, published by Nika Entertainment to support charity project "Make your dream come true"
